data.eml:eml: Lithobius (Monotarsobius) monoforaminis sp. n., a new species of lithobiid centipede from central China (Chilopoda, Lithobiomorpha, Lithobiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ma, Huiqin, Pei, Sujian, Wu, Dayong, Lin, Hongjun, Gai, Yonghua (2012): Lithobius (Monotarsobius) monoforaminis sp. n., a new species of lithobiid centipede from central China (Chilopoda, Lithobiomorpha, Lithobiidae). ZooKeys 193: 79-87, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.193.2802, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.193.2802
